aggregated_key_points: App Stability & Data Accuracy: Frequent reports of technical glitches, including app crashes, unresponsiveness, difficulties opening option chains, and issues with live data display or chart accuracy.

Order Execution & Performance: Concerns regarding slow order execution in option trading, stop-loss orders exiting at unfavorable prices, and occasional blocking of buy/sell functionalities during market volatility.

User Interface & Trading Experience: While some users find the platform smooth and easy for investment, others criticize frequent interface changes, limited indicators, and a lack of user-friendliness for F&O trading.
Brokerage & Hidden Charges: There are complaints about high brokerage fees and perceived additional charges compared to competing platforms.
Positive Aspects: A segment of users commends the app for smooth performance, fast response, and overall reliability, particularly for long-term investing.
Users frequently report app outages, crashes, or failures to open, preventing access and trading.
Specific issues are noted in option trading, where positions may not display after order execution, leading to reported user losses.
Glitches have caused discrepancies between displayed trade information/amounts and actual results.
Technical errors, such as data fetching issues, have rendered the app unresponsive or improperly functioning for periods.

aggregated_key_points: Users frequently request more advanced charting tools and indicators (e.g., Fibonacci, Pivot Point Standard), along with integrated stop-loss and target setting directly on charts.

Several critical data and feature gaps are reported, including missing mutual fund holdings information, specific stock indexes, 'trade value' on mobile, and 10-year historical data for mutual funds. Users also desire enhanced watchlist functionality like saving initial stock prices and a screener-like view.

UI and workflow usability issues include small font size, lack of confirmation prompts for feature activation/deactivation, inefficient navigation requiring multiple taps on holding pages, and dissatisfaction with the display in the new option chain.
Users find the dashboard messy when managing multiple funds of different categories and request grouping or categorization features.
There is a request for 24/7 real-time total portfolio percentage of profit or loss, replacing daily alerts.
A bug has been reported where portfolio stocks are incorrectly displayed in the wishlist.
The app currently lacks support for dual apps or clone app functionality on certain Android devices.

aggregated_key_points: The introduction of a minimum brokerage fee (e.g., ₹5) has led some users to discontinue new investments.
Many users perceive the app to have high brokerage fees, charges, and taxes, significantly impacting their net profits.
Users express dissatisfaction with unexpected charges, such as for editing personal details, and a general lack of transparency regarding fee structures.
There are complaints about customer care not providing proper explanations for various charges.
Feedback on brokerage and account maintenance fees is mixed, with some users rating them as 'excellent' while others find them excessive.
